ABC of Games

Whether you're looking to become a rock-star game developer or E-sport champion, you must understand how games truly work. Many games share similar concepts which have been broken down into the ABC of Games. Select a lesson below to start the exploration! Follow the Optimal Lesson Plan for the best learning experience.

(hover over lesson to see interactive preview)

Optimal Lesson Plan

Most of the lessons reference one or more other concepts to provide a comprehensive understanding of the topic. Going in alphabetical order is not necessarily the best way to learn all the topics as earlier lessons contain references to future topics. Listed below is the optimal order in which the lessons can be reviewed. Going in the order listed will ensure you have already learned all other topics referenced in a lesson.

S
S is for Sprite
START
